summary: Implemented a new guarded actor-initialization hook with timeout + raw error logging, added IC stopped-canister error detection/parsing, and updated error sanitization and the error screen to display more user-friendly messages (including canister ID when available). Also refactored query hooks to use the guard. Diff summary indicates additional unrelated UI/routes/styling changes beyond the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified multiple unrelated UI/UX and marketplace styling changes (new routes/pages, OLX-inspired design tokens, header/footer redesign, various marketplace component changes) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on stopped-canister error UX, error sanitization, createActor warning removal, and preventing duplicate access-control initialization; it explicitly does not request new pages/routes or broad UI restyling.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx, frontend/src/components/FloatingAddButton.tsx, frontend/src/components/AddItemModal.tsx, frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx, multiple page files)
